titleStmt.title: The spirituall madman, or, A prophesie concerning, the King, the Parliament, London, the Army; of the admirable fulnesse, and compleatnesse, of the restauration, and satisfaction of all interests. / Written by VVilliam Sedgewick.
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, William, 1609 or 10-1669?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
